seo.title: Fresi - JavaScript-First Developer Assistant Powered by AI
seo.description: AI-powered open source developer assistant for searching up-to-date information directly in modern documentations.

old-browser.title: Your browser is too old
old-browser.description: For Fresi to work correctly, please update your browser to the latest version.

app.cookie: We use cookies to ensure that Fresi works correctly. By continuing to use the site, you agree to the use of cookies.
app.improvements-notice: If you have any ideas for improving the service, or found a bug, please create an issue on GitHub.
app.subscription-required: To use this feature, you need a subscription

hero.title: Developer Assistant Powered by AI
hero.description: Just ask Fresi instead of spending days reading documentations or using other AIs with outdated information

how-it-works.title: How it works?
how-it-works.description: Fresi has a unique system that provides you with fresh and relevant information

update.title: Update
update.description: Tech documentations are updated daily to maintain the most up-to-date information for you to search

ai.title: AI Models
ai.description: Each question is processed by multiple AI models simultaneously to provide the most relevant answers for you

chat.title: Chat
chat.description: Developer-friendly chat built with the latest technologies makes your communication with Fresi as efficient as possible

features.title: What will you get?
features.description: If you are a developer, you can get rid of other AI chats

docs-search.title: Search
docs-search.description: Fresi is looking for the information directly in the official documentations to provide answers to your questions

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: Fresi does its best to find and add direct links to official sources to ensure information accuracy for each answer

chat.title: Chat
chat.description: Chat allows you to get answers with maximum accuracy to any question, even non-programming

ai-models.title: AI Models
ai-models.description: Fresi uses several AI models from the leading companies to provide the best answers to your queries

js-interface.title: Interface
js-interface.description: Chat was developed using modern technologies to cover developers specific needs and purposes

advantage.title: Advantage
advantage.description: Best JavaScript AI Assistant for solving everyday tasks created by developers for developers

companies.title: Models
companies.description: Fresi uses the latest AI models from the most popular providers

available.but-anything: But you can ask anything! Fresi can easily chat with you on any topic

not-only.title: Not only JavaScript
not-only.description: Fresi can also provide answers to non-programming questions using the latest AI models

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Subscribe and accelerate information searches for routine questions and tasks

auth.banner: Start getting real answers to your questions

chat.title: What will we search?
chat.sign-in: To use chat, please sign in to your account.
chat.error: Oops, something went wrong. If the error persists, please rephrase your question.
chat.generate-confirm: Are you sure you want to generate a new version of this message?
chat.but-anything: But you can ask anything! Fresi can easily chat with you on any topic
chat.mistake: Fresi still can make mistakes even with our data.
chat.remove-chat-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
chat.to-view-history-subscription-required: To view the chat history, please subscribe

validations.email: The field must be a valid email address
validations.url: The field must be a valid URL address
validations.invalid-number: The field must be a valid number
validations.too-small: The field must contain at least {count} characters | The field must contain at least {count} character | The field must contain at least {count} characters | The field must contain at least {count} characters
validations.too-big: The field must contain at most {count} characters | The field must contain at most {count} characters | The field must contain at most {count} characters | The field must contain at most {count} characters
validations.min: The value must be at least {count}
validations.max: The value must be at most {count}
validations.only-letters-number-minus: The field can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

errors.not-found: We couldn't find what you were looking for
errors.internal-error: Oops, something went wrong. We're already working on it.
errors.auth-error: Authentication error. Sorry, we're fixing it right now!
